sentences.en: "Research in the UK shows those born at the start of the school year also do better academically and have more confidence," he said.
sentences.cn: 班纳还说道：“英国的研究人员还发现，在学校学年开始时出生的人，会在学术上表现得较好，而且他们也更有自信。”
他开始在学术上超越他人。

sentences.en: Academically, Huamei - Bond students are very successful at Trent University.
sentences.cn: 从学术上说, 中加高中的学生在我们特伦特大学是非常成功的.

sentences.en: Academically, this is a good school.
sentences.cn: 从学术角度上来说, 这是个好学校.

sentences.en: Administration and Administrative Law both are basic and academically arguable concepts.
sentences.cn: 行政与行政法是行政法学上两个最具基础性的,同时也是存在一定学术争议的概念范畴.

sentences.en: And the research method is academically valuable.
sentences.cn: 本文所采用的研究方法、揭示的规律与现象也有重要的学术价值.

sentences.en: Besides, the research method and the working principle presented are academically valuable.
sentences.cn: 本文所采用的研究方法、揭示的规律和现象,亦有重要的学术价值.

sentences.en: Challenge yourself academically, but give yourself plenty of time for fun as well.
sentences.cn: 学业上要努力，但也要给自己充足的娱乐时间。

sentences.en: He is a giant academically but a dwarf in everyday matter.
sentences.cn: 在学术上他是个巨人,但在日常生活中却是个矮子.

sentences.en: However translation variation shall be academically studied since it has great value.
sentences.cn: 但翻译变体既有其存在的价值就应当得到正视,以及合理的规范.

sentences.en: I am also academically and challenged when asked questions by those in positions to change things.
sentences.cn: 当身居要位的人物向我发问时,我也很有学术成就感.

sentences.en: It does care for pupils who do not do well academically.
sentences.cn: 因为它地确照顾到了成绩差的学生.

sentences.en: It is academically recognized that there existed compound consonants in ancient Chinese.
sentences.cn: 上古汉语存在复辅音,已为历史音韵学界共认.

sentences.en: John played the field academically, obtaining doctorates from several universities.
sentences.cn: 约翰的学术广博, 他从几所大学拿到了博士学位.

sentences.en: Nga Man is making steady progress academically.
sentences.cn: 雅雯在学术上获得稳固的进步.

sentences.en: The origin of the local government's tax power was disputed academically.
sentences.cn: 地方税权的来源在学术上是存在争论的.

trans.tran_cn: 从学术观点，关于学院或大学，关于学会或协会，以学者风度
